SELECT SUM(wms_storage_out_item.transaction_quantities) AS finishedCount FROM wms_storage_out_item LEFT JOIN wms_storage_out on (wms_storage_out.id = wms_storage_out_item.storage_out_id AND wms_storage_out_item.type='STORAGEOUT' and wms_storage_out.`status`='Audit_Passed') LEFT JOIN wms_sales ON ( wms_storage_out.sales_id = wms_sales.id and wms_storage_out.transaction_type = 'CustomerStorageOut' ) WHERE wms_sales.id=#{salesId} AND wms_storage_out_item.sku_id=#{skuId}

SELECT SUM(wms_storage_out_item.transaction_quantities) AS finishedCount FROM wms_storage_out_item LEFT JOIN wms_storage_out on (wms_storage_out.id = wms_storage_out_item.storage_out_id AND wms_storage_out_item.type='STORAGEOUT' and wms_storage_out.`status`='Wait_To_Audit') LEFT JOIN wms_sales ON (wms_storage_out.sales_id = wms_sales.id and wms_storage_out.transaction_type = 'CustomerStorageOut') WHERE wms_sales.id=#{salesId} AND wms_storage_out_item.sku_id=#{skuId}

SELECT SUM(wms_storage_out_item.transaction_quantities) AS finishedCount FROM wms_storage_out_item
LEFT JOIN wms_sales ON ( wms_storage_out_item.storage_out_id = wms_sales.id and wms_storage_out_item.type = 'TRADER' ) WHERE wms_sales.id=#{salesId}

SELECT wms_storage_out_item.transaction_quantities AS outCount FROM wms_storage_out_item LEFT JOIN wms_sales on (wms_sales.id=wms_storage_out_item.storage_out_id AND wms_storage_out_item.type='CustomerStorageOut') WHERE wms_sales.id=#{salesId} AND wms_storage_out_item.sku_id=#{skuId}

SELECT SUM(wms_storage_out_item.transaction_quantities) AS storageOutCount FROM wms_storage_out_item LEFT JOIN wms_storage_out on (wms_storage_out.id = wms_storage_out_item.storage_out_id AND wms_storage_out_item.type = 'Others') LEFT JOIN wms_sales ON ( wms_sales.id = wms_storage_out.sales_id AND wms_storage_out.transaction_type = 'CustomerStorageOut' ) WHERE wms_sales.id = #{salesId} AND wms_storage_out_item.sku_id = #{skuId}

SELECT wms_sales.*, wms_trader.trader_name as traderName, wms_trader.trader_contact_phone as traderContactPhone, wms_trader.trader_contact_name as traderContactName FROM wms_sales left JOIN wms_trader on wms_trader.id = wms_sales.trader_id WHERE 1=1 and wms_sales.id = #{id}

SELECT wms_storage_out_item.*, t_sku_product.sku_code as skuCode, t_sku_product.bar_code as skuBarcode, t_sku_product.sku_name as skuName, t_sku_product.field1 as skuUnit FROM wms_storage_out_item
left join wms_sales on (wms_storage_out_item.storage_out_id = wms_sales.id and wms_storage_out_item.type='TRADER')
LEFT JOIN t_sku_product ON wms_storage_out_item.sku_id = t_sku_product.id
WHERE wms_sales.id = #{id}

SELECT wms_storage_out.*, wms_warehouse.warehouse_name as warehouseName, wms_warehouse_slot.slot_name as slotName
FROM wms_storage_out left join wms_warehouse on wms_warehouse.id = wms_storage_out.warehouse_id left join wms_warehouse_slot on wms_warehouse_slot.id = wms_storage_out.slot_id WHERE 1=1 AND wms_storage_out.id = #{id}

SELECT wms_storage_out_item.*, t_sku_product.sku_code as skuCode, t_sku_product.bar_code as skuBarcode, t_sku_product.sku_name as skuName, t_sku_product.field1 as skuUnit FROM wms_storage_out_item
left join wms_storage_out on (wms_storage_out_item.storage_out_id = wms_storage_out.id and wms_storage_out_item.type='STORAGEOUT')
LEFT JOIN t_sku_product ON wms_storage_out_item.sku_id = t_sku_product.id
WHERE wms_storage_out.id = #{id}

SELECT wms_sales.sales_code, wms_sales.id, wms_sales.sales_total, wms_sales.total_count, wms_sales.transaction_time, wms_sales.sales_status, wms_trader.trader_name as traderName FROM wms_sales left JOIN wms_trader on wms_trader.id = wms_sales.trader_id WHERE 1=1
AND wms_trader.trader_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{traderName},'%')
AND wms_sales.sales_code LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.salesCode},'%')
AND wms_sales.trader_id LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.traderId},'%')
AND wms_sales.sales_others_payment LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.salesOthersPayment},'%')
AND wms_sales.sales_discount LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.salesDiscount},'%')
AND wms_sales.sales_total LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.salesTotal},'%')
AND wms_sales.sales_time LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.salesTime},'%')
AND wms_sales.sales_note LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.salesNote},'%')
AND wms_sales.sales_status LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.salesStatus},'%')
AND wms_sales.transaction_by LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.transactionBy},'%')
AND wms_sales.originator_id LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.originatorId},'%')
AND wms_sales.originator_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.originatorName},'%')
AND wms_sales.transaction_time >= date(#{startTime}) AND wms_sales.transaction_time < DATE_ADD(date(#{endTime}),INTERVAL 1 DAY)
AND wms_sales.field1 LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.field1},'%')
AND wms_sales.field2 LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.field2},'%')
order by wms_sales.transaction_time DESC
